Description: Amla is a medicinal plant that has been used in traditional Indian medicine for centuries. It is a rich source of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, and has been shown to have a wide range of health benefits, including boosting immunity, improving digestion, protecting against cancer, controlling diabetes, and reducing inflammation.

Ashwagandha is a medicinal plant that has been used for centuries to reduce stress, improve sleep, boost cognitive function, enhance physical performance, regulate blood sugar, reduce inflammation, and support the immune system.

Betel leaves have been used in traditional medicine for centuries to treat a variety of conditions, including oral health problems, digestive issues, respiratory problems, wounds, and pain. However, it is important to be aware of the potential side effects before using betel leaves for medicinal purposes.

Giloy is a medicinal plant that has been used for centuries to boost immunity, treat fever and infections, reduce inflammation, protect against liver damage, improve digestion, control diabetes, and reduce stress and anxiety.

Mint is a versatile herb with a wide range of medical uses, including relieving digestive problems, respiratory problems, pain, and skin conditions. It can be consumed fresh, dried, or in a variety of other forms.

Neem is a medicinal plant that has been used for centuries to boost immunity, reduce inflammation, treat skin conditions, promote digestive health, protect against cancer, and relieve pain and fever. It can be consumed as a tea, juice, capsule, or in ointments and creams

Tulsi is a medicinal plant that has been used in Ayurveda for centuries to boost immunity, reduce inflammation, treat respiratory problems, promote digestive health, protect against cancer, and relieve stress and anxiety. It can be consumed as a tea, juice, capsule, or in food and drinks.
